thread.title: A Pack Of Fat Siberian Tigers Hunted Down A Drone And Ripped It To Shreds In Satisfying Video
thread.title_full: A Pack Of Fat Siberian Tigers Hunted Down A Drone And Ripped It To Shreds In Satisfying Video

author: Matt Keohan
title: A Pack Of Fat Siberian Tigers Hunted Down A Drone And Ripped It To Shreds In Satisfying Video
text:
See how fucking fat those tigers are, bro? Sorry PC police, *big boned.
These husky Siberian tigers live at the Siberian Tiger Park in China’s Heilongjiang province and, in an effort to get the tigers some exercise to shed the winter weight, attendants at the enclosure decided to fly a drone around the park for the tigers to chase.
Well, there goes a couple grand. The tigers tracked that shit down like a pack of dudes in colored shirts at a bar full of bachelorette parties.
Same, bro…
YouTube
